amendment.description: At the end of the bill, before the short title, add the following new section: Sec. 507. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used to finalize, promulgate, or enforce the Department of Energy's proposed rule entitled "Energy Conservation Program for Consumer Products: Energy Conservation Standards for Residential Furnaces" (80 Fed. Reg. 48: March 12, 2015).
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 13 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit use of funds to finalize, promulgate, or enforce the DOE's proposed rule entitled "Energy Conservation Program for Consumer Products: Energy Conservation Standards for Residential Furnaces".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Blackburn amendment (A055) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A055) offered by Mrs. Blackburn.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Blackburn amendment (A055) Agreed to by voice vote.
